General.Name: Samil Pharm
General.Description: Samil Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd engages in the manufacture and sale of indispensable medicines in South Korea. It offers hepatic, gastrointestinal, vasodilator, antithrombotic, respiratory, skeletal muscle relaxants, circulatory, neurological, antibiotics, metabolic, antihistamines, immunosuppressive, hormone, anti-tumor, urinary, and ophthalmic drugs, as well as antipyretic, analgesic, and anti-inflammatory agents. The company also provides OTC products and sanitary aids. Samil Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
